body:
What: DIVA Day
When: October 19, 2012
Where: MIT, Cambridge, MA

Dear all:

Please join us for the first-ever DIVA Day -- a conference on the use of environmental analysis in design practice and research.  The full-day event includes a series of presentations and discussions, focused on how DIVA and associated simulation tools can be used in design and performance-evaluation workflows.  Sessions include introductions to new features by the DIVA Team, and research and case studies by practitioners at leading architectural, engineering and consulting firms and universities.  A preliminary agenda and further details about logistics and registration can be found at http://diva4rhino.com/diva-day. Early bird registration ends September 21, 2012.

We look forward to seeing you there!

The DIVA Team
